dialog.TEXT: Welcome to your last stop. Eternal damnation between seats and forgotten cases in this train with no destiny.
I shall never let you cross these bars, and in the most improbable case you did... may the darkness guide you and the shadows be your company.

Sis?... sis... Is that you? I've been seeing nothing but darkness for far too long, I'm scared, I don't know how I ended up here. I'm at the last stop of a green train line... Come rescue me, so we can get out of this hell. I will guide you.
Remember those pink sneakers you gave me for my birthday? I know it costed you a lot to get them.
Remember the legend of the station that was decorated and completely illuminated and then never opened? It was cursed. Maybe that's why they never opened it you can imagine...
I still think about those nights when we stayed up doing puzzles together... Those are some of my favorite memories with you, Nadia. I miss you so much. Things haven't been the same without you.

How did you manage to get out of your prison?! It was supposed to be your last stop. How dare you tiny soul stand against your judgment?! It doesn't matter... Lets see how dauntless you are when face to face with the very incarnation of wrath and greed!
Sis... Can you hear me? I can hear your steps closer, but you still have a long way to go... Hurry, there is something lurking in the shadows, I don't have much time...
You can count on me like one, two, three, I'll be there and i know when i need it. Remember this song we used to love to play it all the time?

Icicles and Stalactites!! I never imagined you'd make it this far. I'm surrounded by incompetents, Noma gets herself killed against an unarmed human and Belfegor just messaged me that he is not in the mood to fight, can you believe it? But nonetheless, you are not getting past myself. I hope you're not afraid of the cold, because you're gonna spend the rest of eternity as an ice sculpture decorating my lair. Come on, it's time to dance on the ice!

Congratulations big sister! You're getting stronger every day, I never doubted you! I can hear your footsteps getting closer... Hurry, come find me. I need you! Everything around me is shaking... I think something huge is approaching. My life is in danger... Please, hurry!

Sis, I think you are at the central station. It reminded me of one of those where we got off with my mum when we went to the centre. Then I remember going through a tunnel and suddenly seeing the snow, I remember our house before coming to Barcelona, I was playing with the snow until suddenly everything went dark and they caught me. Follow the coldest line

Remember those afternoons when you used to pick me up from school and we would go to the park near my school, at first it was hard to find friends when we first arrived, but now I want to get out of here and see all my friends and I trust we will both go out together.
I remember going through that door, I think that's the way. It seems the door is locked, you have to defeat someone else sister.
I remember when you told me not to eat snow too fast or it'd stab my chest like needles. But I still did it. I said it was ice cream. You rolled your eyes, but you let me pretend.
Do you remember when we wanted to keep our snowman in the fridge to prevent it from defrosting? The next day when dad came home he gave us a big scolding because we had flooded the fridge.
I remember when you told me if I ever got lost, you'd find me. Even in hell. I've been trying to leave you a trail. I don't know if you can see it... but I'm still trying
Sister trust me, believe me a little leap and we will meet again.
Do you remember when mom and dad brought us to that show, I was really scared of the clown, but with you by my side I felt safe. I knew that you could protect me from anything.
Careful sis, it's quiet around here, isn't it? be careful. The devil knows more for an old man than for a devil
Vampiro Esisten
